headers.subject: [tosdr:2431] Skype class action waiver

html:
Any proceedings to resolve or litigate any dispute in any forum will be conducted solely on an individual basis. Neither you nor a Disputed Party will seek to have any dispute heard as a class action, private attorney general action, or in any other proceeding in which either party acts or proposes to act in a representative capacity. No arbitration or proceeding will be combined with another without the prior written consent of all parties to all affected arbitrations or proceedings.

http://www.skype.com/en/legal/tou/

Title: You waive your right to class action

Topic: waiver

Summary: Your agreement with Skype states that any disputes you may have will be resolved on an individual basis, and that you waive your right to any class action, or any other process in which either party (you or Skype) acts in any kind of representative capacity. 

Score:  50 (mediocre)

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Skype class action waiver
text:

> Any proceedings to resolve or litigate any dispute in any forum will be 
> conducted solely on an individual basis. Neither you nor a Disputed Party

> general action, or in any other proceeding in which either party acts or 
> proposes to act in a representative capacity. No arbitration or proceeding 
> will be combined with another without the prior written consent of all 
> parties to all affected arbitrations or proceedings.
